item.title: Lecture Talk on Math in Action 2019
item.description: Miyah participated as one of the resource speakers in the Lecture Series of the recently concluded Math in Action 2019 last February 9-10, 2019. The event, organized by SAM-UP, a student academic organization in UPLB, was participated by students from different high schools nationwide. With this year's theme, "Connecting the â€¦
item.dc:creator: Miyah D. Queliste
